Module io.helidon.integrations.common.rest
Package io.helidon.integrations.common.rest

Class ApiJsonBuilder<T extends ApiJsonBuilder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.integrations.common.rest.ApiJsonBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the subclass
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiJsonRequest, CreateSecret.SecretContent, DecryptBatch.BatchEntry, EncryptBatch.BatchEntry, PostMetricData.MetricData, PostMetricData.MetricDataPoint
    public abstract class ApiJsonBuilder<T extends ApiJsonBuilder<T>>
extends Object
    Common base class for builders that construct a JSON object.
